'''Curious Casefiles''' is [[Shikanoin Heizou]]'s [[Level 6 Constellation]].

==Trivia==
* The Japanese name of the constellation uses the word {{ja|捕物帳|rm=torimonochou}} which refers to a specific kind of detective stories from the Edo period featuring thief-takers.
